basic_explanation: For general purposes, contains the most common weather variables
current_explanation: Current weather information, including observations and measurements
clouds_explanation: Detailed cloud layer and sunshine duration forecasts
sunmoon_explanation: Information about rising and setting times of sun and moon
agro_explanation: For agricultural purposes, contains soil and vegetation related weather variables
agromodelleafwetness_explanation: Relevant information for monitoring and forecasting leaf wetness
agromodelsowing_explanation: Information about suitable time windows for sowing crops
agromodelspray_explanation: Information about suitable time windows for spaying fields
solar_explanation: Specific solar radiation variables for the solar energy sector
solarensemble_explanation: Aggregated and individual members from the GFS ensemble solar forecast
wind_explanation: Specific wind variables for the wind energy sector
wind80ensemble_explanation: Aggregated and individual members from the GFS ensemble wind forecast
latlongFromSystem: use latitude and longitude from system settings
tempunitFromSystem: use temperature unit from system settings
applicationKeyHint: Get meteoblue non-commercial API service here. View your personal API-Key here.
application_explanation: For non-commercial uses, meteoblue.com offers the meteogram 5 days and the data package basic-day.
application_link: A description of the values can be found here.
